select t.*,t1.supplier_name as supplierName,t2.note as orderStatusNote, t3.note as sendTypeNote, t4.contract_name as contractName, t5.note as payTypeNote from t_pss_order_purchase t left join t_pss_supplier t1 on t.supplier_code = t1.supplier_code left join t_pss_dict t2 on t.status = t2.code and t2.type = 'ddzt' left join t_pss_dict t3 on t.send_type = t3.code and t3.type = 'sdfs' left join t_pss_contract_purchase t4 on t.contract_code_p = t4.contract_code left join t_pss_dict t5 on t.pay_type = t5.code and t5.type = 'fkfs' where 1=1
and t.status = #{orderPurchaseDto.status}
